law.catch_line: Plan to be in addition to any other retirement, pension or benefit systems.

text.section: The deferred compensation plan authorized hereunder and any other plan approved and adopted as herein provided, will exist and serve in addition to any other retirement, pension or benefit systems established by the federal government, the State of Florida or Miami-Dade County, and shall not supersede, make inoperative or reduce any benefits provided by the Florida Retirement System or by any other retirement, pension or benefit program established by law.
